full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 788 Filed 07/21/25 Page 1 of 1 UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, - v. - GHISLAINE MAXWELL, Defendant. No. 20 CR. 330 (PAE) NOTICE OF APPEARANCE TO: Clerk of Court United States District Court Southern District of New York The undersigned attorney respectfully requests that the Clerk note his appearance in this case as counsel for the United States of America and add him as a Filing User to whom Notices of Electronic Filing will be transmitted in this case. Date: New York, New York July 21, 2025 Respectfully submitted, JAY CLAYTON United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York By: /s/ Jeffrey Oestericher JEFFREY OESTERICHER Assistant United States Attorney 86 Chambers Street, 3rd Floor New York, New York 10007 Telephone: (212) 637-2695 Facsimile: (212) 637-0033 Email: Jeffrey.Oestericher@usdoj.gov DOJ-OGR-00015046
